verbs.description: France , the U.K. and Germany [V: had] attempted a last - ditch push to get Trump to change his mind in recent weeks .
[ARG0: France , the U.K. and Germany] had [V: attempted] [ARG1: a last - ditch push to get Trump to change his mind in recent weeks] .
[ARG0: France , the U.K. and Germany] had attempted a last - ditch push to [V: get] [ARG1: Trump to change his mind in recent weeks] .
France , the U.K. and Germany had attempted a last - ditch push to get [ARG0: Trump] to [V: change] [ARG1: his mind] [ARGM-TMP: in recent weeks] .
